data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Imagine that your supervisor has offered you a choice between two positions. One consists of tasks that you do really well, while the other would be more challenging and involve learning new skills. Which do you prefer? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: If my supervisor has given me a choice between two positions, I would choose the position that is more challenging and involve learning new skills. The reason for my choice is that I would like to accept challenges in my life no matter in which aspect, as it would help me to learn new skills and broaden my horizon. Besides, taking the challenges in the working environment, I may have a better opportunity to get promotions, or the salary may increase as well. In conclusion, if I can choose a challenging position and learn new skills, I would be happy to accept it and try my best. (107 字)
